getChild

public ModelComponent getChild(java.lang.String childAlias,
                               Fact parent,
                               boolean strict)
Retrieve the ModelComponent from an alias and its Fact parent.

Parameters:
childAlias - alias to search
parent - parent Fact. If null, will search among the root facts.
strict - if strict is true, it will only search for the direct children of the parent. If not, it will recursivelly try to find the alias in all children
Returns:
found ModelComponent. can be a Fact or a FactProperty, or null if not found or something else.

getFact

public ObrFactImpl getFact(java.lang.String childAlias,
                           Fact parent,
                           boolean strict)
Retrieve the Fact from an alias and its Fact parent.

Parameters:
childAlias - alias to search.
parent - parent Fact. If null, will search among the root facts.
strict - if strict is true, it will only search for the direct children of the parent. If not, it will recursivelly try to find the alias in all children
Returns:
found Fact or null if not found

getFactProperties

public java.util.List<FactProperty> getFactProperties(java.lang.String alias,
                                                      boolean caseSensitive)
Get list of fact properties that correspond to a given alias.

Parameters:
alias - fact property alias
caseSensitive - whether string compare should be case sensitive
Returns:
fact property list

findProperty

public FactProperty findProperty(java.lang.String propertyPath)
find a property from its path

Parameters:
propertyPath - ( ex : "Task.creator" , or "Task.payload.invoiceRequestor" )
Returns:
property. null if not found

Given a factPathID, returns a list of all facts in the model matching this ID

Parameters:
factPathID - the ID to search
Returns:
all found facts in the hierarchy
